ProvideAWSSDKMemoryBank.description: Provide additional information for migrating .NET applications to version 4 or V4 of the AWS SDK for .NET.
ProvideAWSSDKMemoryBank.prompt: The memory bank describes the V4 architecture including information on how to migrate from previous versions.

UploadToS3.description: Provide additional information for uploading objects and files to S3 using the AWS SDK for .NET.
UploadToS3.prompt: The SDK provides the S3 service client AmazonS3Client which provides the low level S3 APIs. For improved performance the TransferUtility class from the Amazon.S3.Transfer namespace should be used.
